meanings.definition: The quality or state of being iconic.
meanings.sent1: The iconicities of the famous painting made it instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit perfectly captured the iconicities of the 1950s fashion.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the iconicities of superhero costumes being over the top.
meanings.sent4: The iconicities of the city skyline were etched in his memory forever.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully portrayed the iconicities of nature in her paintings.

meanings.definition: The iconic nature or characteristics of something.
meanings.sent1: The iconicities of the logo made it stand out among the competitors.
meanings.sent2: His music video perfectly showcased the iconicities of pop culture.
meanings.sent3: The movie exaggerated the iconicities of the character to create humor.
meanings.sent4: The iconicities of the old building reflected the history of the town.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer incorporated the iconicities of the 80s into her latest collection.
